title: Phlox

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may purify a player at night, pardoning any of their trials the next day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may purify yourself once.
- While dead, you may purify a player once.
- You may only purify three times.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to purify (player)."
"You have (#) purifications left."

desc:
Post 166
*You are a young flower girl who purifies others with spiritual petals.*
